name: Gravity Hopper
description:
Gravity Hopper

Gravity hopper is a short, physics-based puzzle games where you must utilise gravitational anomalies to drift through space and reach your destination. Click/touch a gravity well to be pulled towards it.

Gravity hopper runs in your browser but you can also download the apk if you want to try it on Android (Android 8.0+ required).

This game is a prototype which was built in a month (~30 hours total) as I continue exploring game development. If you like the gameplay leave a comment and I might make it into a full game with more levels. If you don't like the gameplay, leave a comment anyway I'd love to hear your feedback.

Thanks for playing!

Sorry this game doesn't run on iOS :(
